newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Sandoz sees higher full-year profit.
newsitem.headline: Sandoz sees higher full-year profit.

text.p: Swiss pharmaceuticals and nutrition group Sandoz AG said it expected to report good full-year operating income and a substantial rise in net profit, excluding merger-related factors and barring unforeseen developments.

"Sandoz expects to report good full-year operating income. Excluding merger-related special factors and barring unforeseen developments on the financial markets, consolidated net income should increase substantially," the company said in its nine-month sales report.
Ciba-Geigy AG and Sandoz announced plans lasts March to merge to form the second most powerful company in the industry. The merger is pending U.S. Federal Trade Commission approval.
Sandoz reported a 1995 full year net profit of 2.06 billion francs on sales of 15.24 billion. -- Zurich Editorial +41 1 631 7340
